channel.title: Movie review on Ashwin Narayan

item.title: My Review of Star Trek: Discovery
item.description: This article contains spoilers for all the episodes of Star Trek: Discovery. As a lover of good science fiction I was really happy to hear the announcement of Star Trek: Discovery. I have not watched all of old Star Trek. But from the few that I have watched (Mostly Star Trek: Then Next Generation), I have come to love the Trek universe and the way it handles science fiction.
